data.name: CyberTown
data.detailed_description:
See similar games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1411740/Urbek_City_Builder/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868300/American_Theft_80s_Prologue/


CyberTown - Is an inter-planetary colonization in which we build new cybernetic cities. Take part in an inter-planetary war for a new world. Create your own cities, colonize new planets. Explore the world, collect resources and build your own cities.



Explore the new world where you are looking for a new planet for your community. Colonize the world. Research, collect new resources that can be used to build cities. Fight with Mother Nature and other challenges.



Create new cities, expand them. Take care of the economy of your city and its citizens. Strikes and uprisings await you while you run your own city. Enemy attacks and ambushes, silencing of units unfavorable to your power. You decide how to act.



Create your army, expand it so it can protect its citizens. Build your own air fleet which you will use in combat.



Protect your cities. Fight the other side of the barricade. Use technological and information novelties during combat to surprise the enemy.

data.short_description: CyberTown - Is an inter-planetary colonization in which we build new cybernetic cities. Take part in a race war between wild and modified humans. Food disasters and other challenges await you on your way.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Thai, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 / Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core / Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
